WRITING.TITLE: nothing special
WRITING.TEXT: So Reddit this is my first post, Im 28 living in a dead end town in Idaho, and i think it is slowly taking away my will to live, i have a lot of ideas i want to get afloat but not the know how to do it. i wish there was someway out can Reddit help me?
